products.name: Orange
products.description: The orange has a sweet-tart taste and is commonly peeled and eaten fresh, or squeezed for its juice. It has a thick, bitter rind that is usually discarded, but can be used in cooking

products.name: Apple
products.description: The apple is a pome (fleshy) fruit, in which the ripened ovary and surrounding tissue both become fleshy and edible.

products.name: Pear
products.description: Pear fruits are generally sweeter and of softer texture than apples and are distinguished by the presence of hard cells in the flesh

products.name: Banana
products.description: The banana is a lengthy yellow fruit, found in the market in groups of three to twenty fruits, similar to a triangular cucumber, oblong and normally yellow. Its flavour is more or less sweet, depending on the variety.
